perturbation.original_text: Each of the parties to this Agreement consents to personal jurisdiction for any emergency injunction sought in the Court of Rome. However, subsequent to the emergency injunction hearing, the merits of the matter will be decided by the ICC as per the procedure set forth above.
perturbation.changed_text: However, subsequent to any injunction hearing, the merits of the matter will be decided by the ICC as per the procedure set forth above.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clause 'Each of the parties to this Agreement consents to personal jurisdiction for any emergency injunction sought in the Court of Rome' the agreement removes the consent to personal jurisdiction for emergency injunctions in the Court of Rome. Italy, as part of the EU, adheres to Regulation (EU) No 1215/2012, which governs jurisdiction and the recognition and enforcement of judgments in civil and commercial matters. Although parties can agree on jurisdiction, removing the consent to the court of Rome introduces ambiguity and potential conflict with Italian law regarding provisional measures. The agreement becomes less compliant and introduces legal risk.

Kiromic acknowledges receipt of a copy of MOLIPHARMA's Anti-Corruption Policies and confirms that it has Anti-Corruption Policies in place that are at least comparable to MOLIPHARMA's.

perturbation.changed_text:
Each Party recognizes and acknowledges that it is obliged to comply with relevant rules.

Each Party warrants and undertakes to the other that: (a) it has not, and to its best knowledge and belief none of its current or former directors, managers, officers or employees has, and, so far as it is aware, no other person who otherwise is or has been one of its Associated Persons has, at any time in the last [five (5)] years before the date of this Agreement: (i) made, given, authorized or offered, or promised to make, give, authorize or offer any Prohibited Advantage to any person in order to assist it or any of its Subsidiaries in improperly obtaining or retaining business for or with any person, in improperly directing business to any person or in securing any improper advantage; (ii) taken any other action which would violate applicable rules; (iii) been the subject of any investigation, inquiry or litigation, administrative or enforcement proceedings by any Authority or any customer or other person regarding any offence or alleged offence under any rules and no such investigation, inquiry, litigation or proceeding has been threatened or is pending and, so far as it is aware,
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'Anti-Corruption' and replacing with just 'rules', and also removing the sentence 'Kiromic acknowledges receipt of a copy of MOLIPHARMA's Anti-Corruption Policies and confirms that it has Anti-Corruption Policies in place that are at least comparable to MOLIPHARMA's', the clarity regarding adherence to anti-corruption measures is significantly reduced. This creates a **legal contradiction** because Kiromic (a Delaware company) is required to adhere to the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) and Molipharma must follow Italian anti-corruption laws. This vagueness introduces legal risk.
perturbation.contradicted_law: U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) and Italian anti-corruption laws.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall inform (and shall use all reasonable endeavors to procure that any of its Associated Companies and the Company shall inform) any officer, employee or agent or any professional adviser advising it in relation to the matters referred to in this Agreement, or to whom it provides Confidential Information, that such information is confidential and shall require them: (a) to keep it confidential; and (b) not to disclose it to any third party (other than those persons to whom it has already been disclosed in accordance with the terms of this Agreement).
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party shall inform any officer, employee or agent or any professional adviser advising it in relation to the matters referred to in this Agreement, or to whom it provides Confidential Information, that such information is confidential and should aim to keep confidential.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase '(and shall use all reasonable endeavors to procure that any of its Associated Companies and the Company shall inform)' and changing 'shall require them: (a) to keep it confidential; and (b) not to disclose it to any third party' to 'should aim to keep confidential', the duty to ensure confidentiality is greatly weakened. This could lead to issues concerning trade secrets and proprietary information. In many jurisdictions, including both Delaware (Kiromic) and Italy (Molipharma), there are laws protecting trade secrets. Diluting the requirement to actively enforce confidentiality introduces a legal risk and makes the agreement less compliant with trade secret laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Delaware Trade Secrets Act, Italian Intellectual Property Code (CPI)
